Error Creating User Directory! Error Deleting File! File Replace Warning A file with the same name already exists, what do you want to do? Rename File Share File With Please make sure you are connected to the internet!

CARPE Controller App Update There is an update for the controller app, do you want to update now? \n Whats New: Downloading CARPE Update Download progress:
Tripltek T93 Trial Since you are using a Tripltek T93 you have 30-day free trial. If you have a special DMD2 Edition license key, please insert it to claim it. Continue Trial Insert Key End Trial Insert DMD2-Edition Key:

Notifications Enable notifications pop-up (permission required) Show notifications from a user selectable list of apps Dismiss method
Timeout after 5s

Handlebar controller focus When a notification is visible, the CARPE controller will focus on it. The enter key launches the notification action and the back key clears the notification. Apps filter Select for which apps you want to see the notification pop-up Show only the last notification from each group If enabled you will only see the latest notification update for each notification group. For example, the latest message from a chat notification. Show Notifications For: All / None Close
Trip Options Automatic Trip Reset Trip will automatically reset if DMD2 is not started for more than a configurable amount of time Automatic Trip Reset Time
6 hours
12 hours
1 day
2 days
5 days
OEM Registration Registration Process (requires internet connection) Only use if your motorcycle came equipped with an Android device with Drive Mode Dashboard 2 pre-installed.
Information and Links DMD2 Version Installed version: Learn more about the DMD2 app on the official website DMD2 is brought to you by This version of DMD2 is optimized for Tripltek devices Visit and follow our Facebook page for the latest news Join our Facebook group Join the discussion about new features, bugs and requests Special License Keys Trial / DMD2 Edition Manage Trial or insert DMD2 Edition key
Welcome to DMD2 DMD2 is designed to transform your device into a complete dashboard for motorcycles and cars with special focus on adventure and off-road. It includes a Map for navigation, a Roadbook, OBD2 Sensors and much more. Start
GPS Settings Lower GPS Accuracy Filter For devices with sub-optimal GPS quality
Non Play Store Devices Options Disable CARPE Controller App Check Will stop monitoring the controller app and will not ask to install it or update it anymore. CARPE Controller Detected It seems you are using a CARPE Controller. To take full advantage of it you should install the controller app. Do you want to install it now?
Storage Set Storage to Removable SD Card For offline map files and user files. SD Card is Missing! Previously used SDCard is missing, please insert it! Retry Use Internal Memory Waiting for SD Card to Mount Please wait for the SD Card mount to finishâ€¦ Abort & Switch to Internal Memory Different SD Card! It seems you have replaced your SD Card, do you want to use this card? If not please insert the correct card! Re-Check SD Card still not found! Please check again! Move Map Files? Do you want to move the map files from internal memory to SD-Card? This operation might fail if you do not have enough space! Do you want to move the map files from removable SD-Card to the internal memory? This operation might fail if you do not have enough space! Moving files, please wait! Do not close the app or move to another screen!
TRIP Trip Statistics View real-time values about your ride, information like distance, total time, travel time, stop time and average speed. APPS App Shortcuts Set quick access app shortcuts to launch your favorite apps. Select App Shortcut or Clear Slot Clear Slot OBD RPM OBD RPM Indicator An OBD based RPM bar with a clean design, includes red line color change and numeric indicator. HEADING GPS Heading A graphical indicator for your current heading based on GPS data, includes the numeric degree value. MEDIA Media Player Control Allows you to control your active media session, includes album artwork and track and artist name (requires notifications access permission). NAV Map View Your map view with all the loaded content and active states, does not include map controls and can only be loaded on the left panel. SPEED GPS Speed A big numeric speed value showing your current travel speed based on GPS data. INFO GPS & OBD Indicators User selectable values from OBD sensors and GPS data. NOTIFICATIONS Notifications List A list of your currently active notifications. No notifications yet EXTERNAL WIDGET System Widget Load Android system widgets from your installed apps. CLOCK A Big Clock Just a simple big digital clock, in case time is crucial for you. PROGRESS Map Nav Progress Shows navigation instructions or GPX track progress depending on the active state between the two. Select Widget
Left Panel Right Panel Center Top Center Bottom Change Widget
Distance Total Time Travel Time Stop Time Avg Speed
Select GPS/OBD Sensor GPS Altitude Altitude GPS Heading Time Heading GPS Speed Speed Trip Max Speed Max Speed Trip Distance Trip Total Time Trip Travel Time Trip Stop Time Trip Avg Speed OBD Speed RPM Coolant Voltage Fuel Throttle Spark MAP IAT MAF Invisible Reset AdvCtrl Voltage
Media Control Permission Media Control Widget requires access to notifications to read media player content like title, artist, album name and artwork. Do you want to allow this permission?
Trip Reset Are you sure you want to reset the trip statistics?
Notifications Pop-Up Do you want DMD2 to access notifications to show you a pop-up for any new notification? You can configure which apps you want to see pop-up for in the Settings > Notifications.
New Notifications Left/Right - Dismiss
Favorite Apps Apps Filter Enable apps filter Hides the apps set in the app filter list Sorting Select how to sort the app shortcuts
App Name - Alphabetical
App Developer Name - Alphabetical
By Install Date
By Last Updated
Sorting Direction
Ascending
Descending
Set hidden apps Click here to set which apps to hide or show Select Apps to Hide Available actions for this app: Uninstall Hide Cancel
OBD Preferences OBD Bluetooth Device Setup Select which OBD Protocol to use OBD Protocol Reader Config Commands Commands to configure bluetooth reader, separate with a new line Choose Paired OBD Device Select from paired bluetooth devices. Make sure dongle is paired first! Select ELM327 Bluetooth Device Get Voltage from Dongle Use STVR command for voltage reading instead of ECU PID Fuel Level Settings Calculate fuel level If your level is not reported by the ECU you can let DMD2 calculate it based on average mileage per tank. To reset press the fuel icon when you fill up. Fuel Tank Average Mileage What is your average mileage with a full tank Speed and RPM Options GPS Speed Value Source Use GPS/Terrain Wheel Sensor instead of OBD Speed value (which might not be available) Set Maximum RPM Set your vehicle maximum RPM value Set redline RPM Set your redline RPM value Throttle Options Use RAW Throttle Position value Use actual OBD2 raw value or calibrate minimum and maximum positions Calibrate Throttle Position This will start a dialog with instructions for throttle minimum/maximum position calibration. Requires the ECU to be ON and OBD dongle connected, the engine should be off. This will NOT change any value in your ECU!
COOLANT Coolant Temperature VOLTAGE Voltage THROTTLE Throttle Position FUEL Fuel Level SPARK Spark Advance IAT Intake Temperature MAF Mass Air Flow MAP Mass Air Pressure
Select OBD Sensor Set a new OBD Sensor for this slot
Minimum Throttle Position Calibration PLEASE TURN ON THE ENGINE! Make sure vehicle is at stable post warm-up idle!!! Your throttle should be at the minimum position (at idle / totally off). Press the Set button when ready. Set Minimum Maximum Throttle Position Calibration PLEASE TURN OFF THE ENGINE! Make sure ignition is ON and then push your throttle position to the maximum position (full open throttle). Press the Set button when ready. Set Maximum Please Connect to the OBD Dongle First!
Fuel Level Options Reset fuel level if you just filled your tank or manually edit the remaining fuel distance. Reset Edit Set Remaining Fuel Distance Set remaining distance Error: value cannot be higher than tank capacity or lower than 1 Error: not a valid distance number!
No DTC Errors DTC Errors Reset Errors Error Options Ignore Error: Error: You are not connected to the ECU!
OBD Monitor Service Running Connected to dongle! Disconnected from dongle!
OBD2 Demo Mode Demo mode is limited to 15 minutes per session. Buy the OBD Plugin to unlock! Buy Plugin
Instruments Settings Total Distance - Single Decimal Place Will show the Total distance with a single decimal place instead of two Partial - Single Decimal Place Will show the Partial distance with a single decimal place instead of two Visual Settings Invert PDF Colors Inverts the paper color, might be useful for riding during the night. Lock Settings Lock also disables paper touch When lock is enabled any paper touch is ignored. This helps prevent accidental movements or rain drop actions. Lock also disables instruments When lock is enabled the instrument tap actions will also be disabled. Lock also disables top menu When lock is enabled the top menu will also be disabled and only the lock button will work. Sync lock with play/pause Locking will trigger play and unlocking will trigger pause. Adjustments Distance Multiplier Add a correction factor to Total and Partial distance (in case you need to match to Roadbook distances) Hide Instruments Panel If you have your own dedicated instruments and just want to use the PDF roll. Reset Session Unloads current PDF file and resets all statistics and distances. Confirm Reset Are you sure you want to reset the current progress? This unloads current PDF file and resets all statistics and distances! Reset Remote Controller Setup
Paper Roll Up
Paper Roll Down

Decrease Total

Decrease Partial
Reset Total
Reset Partial

Play / Pause
Do Nothing
Up Key Down Key Left Key Right Key Enter Key (no repeat) Enter Key Long Press (only when Locked / no repeat) Button A ( + ) Button B ( - ) Scroll amount per click Adjust the amount of movement for the paper scroll up and down Enable Key Repeat for Joystick If enabled the keys for Up,Down,Left,Right will repeat when held. Set Repeat Speed for Joystick Set Repeat Speed for Buttons

Enable Key Repeat for Buttons If enabled the keys for Button A and Button B will repeat when held. Scroll paper down one click on partial reset

Statistics File Name: No loaded file Total Time: Travel Time: Stop Time: Average Speed: Maximum Speed: Reset Open New File Discard current session and start new one or save progress first so that you can resume it later? Start Now Save First Error Opening File There seems to be a problem reading this PDF file. It is probably not compatible! Distance Correction Factor: Open File or Session Import new PDF file or open Session Manager (manage previous saved sessions)? File Session Give this session a name The session name cannot be empty! Nothing to save! Maybe start by opening a new Roadbook File. Replace or Add New Overwrite the current sessions or add a new entry? Overwrite New Entry Session Name Already Exists A session with this name already exists, do you want to replace or edit the name? Replace Edit Name
Session Manager No saved sessions yet! Save one first. Date: PDF File: Total Distance: Total Time: Travel Time: Average Speed: Load Rename Location Edit this session name This session name is already taken, please choose something else. ERROR: The PDF file for this session does not exist anymore! Session Load Confirmation Are you sure you want to load this session? Any unsaved Roadbook progress will be lost!
Roadbook Demo Mode Demo mode is limited to 15 minutes per session. Buy the Roadbook Plugin to unlock! Buy Plugin License Purchase Your device does not have Play Store installed, you can still purchase a key in our website and then insert it to activate it! Insert Key Purchase Please insert your license key to activate the plugin: Activate Error Activating License Wrong license code or already activated on another device, check licenses in your Thork Racing account page or contact support. License Activated Plugin is now active! Thank you for your support.
No Maps Downloaded Yet You have not yet downloaded any map files. Do you want to do it now? Starting Layers Manager! Select Navigation Mode Use DMD2 to calculate the route or use an external app? Use DMD2 External App Panning Mode Enabled
Map Layers Base Map Source Base data for terrain, roads, buildings, addresses, and elevation. 3D Buildings Converts building areas into basic extruded 3D shapes Scale & Visibility Adjust map, labels and symbols scale and visibility Map Scale Enable Layer Enable Labels Labels Scale Enable Symbols Symbols Scale Enable Shadowssd Download Maps Select Maps to Load Error: The map files are missing, please download them again! No downloaded maps yet, click Download Maps to download! Select Region Select Country Downloaded: Last Update: Size: Region: File Name: Load Map: No Update DMD2 Downloading Please wait for the download to complete! Cannot connect to server, try again later! Not enough storage space! POI Icon Highlight Set POI icons to show at lower zoom levels (500m zoom max)(fuel/hospital/peaks are always enabled). Restaurant Cafe Pub Cafe & Pub Hotel Hostel Accommodation Camping Supermarket Attraction View Point Historic Natural Parking Place Car Repair Monument ATM Bank Gas Station Motorcycle Repair Map Type & Style Select the default minimal and clean map type or a more detailed off-road topographic type. Also set the light and dark color modes. Default Minimal Off-Road Topo Light / Dark Mode: Light Dark Theme Sensor Topo Advanced Options Fine tune the Off-road Topographic map type High-Contrast Mode Show Altitude Lines Unpaved Highlight (visible at low zoom) Show Motorways Show Primary Roads Show Secondary Roads All settings have been reset to defaults! HillShading (online) Shows the topographical shape of hills and mountains using shading Transparency
GPX Manager Load File No file loaded. Press Load File. Tracks Waypoints Center Map GPX Settings Show or Hide Show or hide GPX elements (for all files). This takes priority over individual file settings. Show All Enabled GPX Tracks Show Track Direction Arrows Show All Enabled Waypoints Show Waypoint Title Text Hide Waypoints on Low Zoom Sizes & Transparency Set GPX elements default sizes & transparency Color Defaults Track line default color and color overwrites Track Line Width Track Transparency Direction Arrow Size Waypoint Pin Size Hide All Show All Delete All Default track color (when no color is specified or set by the user): Overwrite all colors set in files to default color: Overwrite all colors set by the user to default color: Auto Load POIs Automatically load POI along the track up to 3 categories Enable auto POI load along the track: Select POI categories to load: The selected GPX file does not contain any tracks! Track Manager No track description available. Track Length Navigate To Start Navigate To End Select Navigation App POI Search The selected GPX file does not contain any waypoints! Waypoints Manager Navigate To Share Location Search Near No waypoint description available. Straight Line Distance Distance from you Track Point Dist. Distance from track start You need to be riding on the same GPX file to get distances information. Waiting for GPS Fix Select app to share Loading track POI search, this might take some timeâ€¦ Advanced Options Invert Travel Direction Attempt to convert full file to navigation: If GPX includes off-road tracks please use MIXED profile!\nLow (Fast): Faster calculation, but may deviate from the original GPX.\nHigh (Slow): Slower calculation, specially on big files, but will deviate less.\nNOTICE: Big GPX files (above 1000Km), even on fast mode, can take foreverâ€¦ Low (Fast) High (Slow) This GPX file does not contain any track!

Map Demo Mode Demo mode is limited to 15 minutes per session. Buy the Map Plugin to unlock! Buy Plugin Map Plugin Purchase Select subscription duration. 12 Month Subscription Lifetime Purchase 6 Month Subscription 12 Month 6 Month Lifetime This option is only available for licensed users!
Auto Zoom & Tilt Enable auto-zoom level Enable auto-tilt level Auto mode only in active navigation Interface Options Enable track progress info box Will show a box on the side of the screen with track progress and distances to next POIs and Waypoints. Disable map touch when locked Specially useful if you have a controller, disables the whole screen touch Map Language Map Language
Localised Map Language
English or available latin alphabet
French > English or available latin alphabet
German > English or available latin alphabet
Navigation Navigate To: Ask to use DMD2 or External If enabled DMD2 will ask if you want to use DMD2 or another app. If disabled it defaults to DMD2. Controller Settings Disable Panning Mode Target Disables the new panning mode target spot actions

Route Planner Road Fast Road Fun Off-Road Avoid Tolls Avoid Motorways Easy Medium Hard Select Profile Select Profile Options Calculating routeâ€¦ Loading Routeâ€¦ Analyzing Routeâ€¦ Error! Continue for Turn Left in Turn Right in Sharp Left in Sharp Right in Slight Left in Slight Right in Keep Left in Keep Right in U-Turn in Keep Straight in First Exit in Second Exit in Third Exit in Fourth Exit in Fifth Exit in Sixth Exit in Seventh Exit in Eight Exit in Destination in Options Active Navigation Options Available options for the active navigation: Share As GPX Missing Calculation Files There are missing calculation files. Please re-download your map files to make sure calculation files are downloaded! Calculation Error There was an error calculating the route!
